title: Senior Staff Software Engineer, Databases, Postgres, Google Cloud
location: Sunnyvale, CA, USA; Kirkland, WA, USA
description: Google Cloud's software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how billions of users connect, explore, and interact with information and one another.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. 8 years of experience in software development, and with data structures/algorithms. 5 years of experience testing and launching software products. 3 years of experience with software design and architecture.
preferred_qualifications: Experience coding in C/C++. Experience in computer science and software development. Experience working in Relational Database Management System (RDBMS) and Infrastructure-as-a-Service in large-scale distributed systems. Experience in database internals and postgres and driving changes to Cloud Database kernel. Experience in transaction processing, SQL, query performance, query plans and optimization. Experience working in database kernel/internals.
responsibilities: Leverage database internals expertise to implement changes to the Cloud Database kernel. Grow and mentor other engineers on database-specific topics. Contribute to the open-source PostgreSQL community. Drive the design and implementation of major components and projects across the database stack for Google Cloud.
